ds_strings_archive.string: Welcome to the Safari Zone! For just ${01}, you can play the\nSafari Game.You can roam the wide-open Safari Zone\nand catch whatever you like. Would you like to play?
Ding-dong! Time's up!\nYour Safari Game is over.
Ding-dong! You've run out of Safari Balls.\nYour Safari Game is over.
Ding-dong! You're out of room for more Pokémon.\nYour Safari Game is over!
That'll be ${01}, please!
OK.\nPlease come again!
Here are your Safari Balls!
{00} received {01} Safari Balls\nfrom the attendant.
We'll call for you when you run out of Safari Balls.\nWell, I hope you enjoy it! Go, and have fun!

Each Area in the Safari has a Rare Pokémon that can change
each day. Heres the list of Rotational Pokémon for each Area.

-Plains: Zigzagoon, Shinx, Ponyta, Manectric,
Houndoom, Surskit, Lotad, Houndour, Zangoose
-Meadow: Riolu, Nosepass, Masquerain, Seedot,
Nuzlead, Chansey 
-Savannah: Azurill, Shroomish, Houndour, Zigzagoon,
Torkoal, Luxio, Cacnea 

-Peak: Aron, Bronzor, Vigoroth, Lineoone,
Zangoose, Spheal
-Rocky Beach: Corphish, Manectric, Aron, Mareep,
Electrike, Gible, Budew
-Wetland: Buizel, Corphish, Shelgon, Pachirisu,
Surskit, FarFetch'd, Lombre

-Forest Area: Beldum, Bidoof, Budew, Electabuzz,
Bronzor, Shuppet
-Swamp: Floatzel, Weepinbell, Furret, Voltorb,
Chimecho, Parasect, Pachirisu, Duskull
-Marshland: Croagunk, Roselia, Seviper, Diglett,
Shuppet, Shuckle, Jumpluff, Carnivine

-Wasteland: Solrock, Skorupi, Illumise, Meditite,
Manectric, Breloom
-Mountain: Duskull, Volbeat, Spheal, Spinda,
Chingling, Meditite, Lunatone, Metang, Illumise
-Desert: Hippopotas, Cacnea, Trapinch, Spinda,
Lotad, Carnivine
[ON COOLDOWN]\n[Recharge takes 6 IRL hours or 1 Game Day]\nThere are no Apricorns...
It's an Apricorn Tree!
Red Apricorn
Yellow Apricorn
Blue Apricorn
Green Apricorn
Pink Apricorn
White Apricorn
Black Apricorn

[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
Falkner: I'm Falkner, the Violet City Pokémon Gym Leader!
People say you can clip Flying-type Pokémon's wings with a
jolt of electricity...I won't allow such insults to bird Pokémon!
I'll show you the real power of the magnificent bird Pokémon!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
Falkner: There are Pokémon Gyms in cities and towns ahead.
You should test your skills at these Gyms. As for your next
move... I would suggest Azalea Town. I'm going to train harder
to become the greatest Bird Keeper of all!

[$8736] / +50%[$13104] / +75%[$15288] / +100%[$17472]
 
Bugsy: I'm Bugsy! I never lose when it comes to Bug-type
Pokémon. My research is going to make me the authority on
Bug-type Pokémon! Let me demonstrate what I've learned
from my studies.
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8736] / +50%[$13104] / +75%[$15288] / +100%[$17472]
 
Bugsy: Bug-type Pokémon are deep. There are many mysteries
to explore. Study your top choices thoroughly.

[$8840] / +50%[$13260] / +75%[$15470] / +100%[$17680]
 
Whitney: Hi! I'm Whitney!...You!I saw you at the Radio Tower just
now. Everyone was into Pokémon, so I got into it, too! Pokémon
are super cute! You want to battle? I'm warning you--I'm good!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8840] / +50%[$13260] / +75%[$15470] / +100%[$17680]
 
Whitney: Ah, that was a good cry! Come for a visit again! Bye-bye!

[$8944] / +50%[$13416] / +75%[$15652] / +100%[$17888]
 
Morty: It's good of you to have come. Here in Ecruteak, Pokémon
have long been revered. It's said that a rainbow-hued Pokémon
will come down to appear before a truly powerful Trainer.
I believed that tale, so I have secretly trained here all my life. As
a result, I can now see what others cannot. I see a shadow of the
person who will make the Pokémon appear. I believe that person
is me! You're going to help me reach that level!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8944] / +50%[$13416] / +75%[$15652] / +100%[$17888]
 
Morty: I get it... The person the Kimono Girls were talking about
must be you... Never mind. You should be strong enough to go
across the sea. When you go west and then south, you'll reach
Olivine City. Why don't you head for it?

[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]
 
Chuck: Ooomph! The pounding waterfall right onto my head...
Arrgh! Why did you stop the waterfall from pouring on me! You
just spoiled my training! I have to warn you that I am a strong
Trainer training every day under this waterfall! What? It has
nothing to do with Pokémon?...That's true!......Come on.
We shall do battle!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]
 
Chuck: Wahahah! I enjoyed battling you! But a loss is a loss!
From now on, I'm going to train 24 hours a day!
[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]\n \nHe's so into his training, he doesn't seem to notice you.

[$9152] / +50%[$13728] / +75%[$16016] / +100%[$18304]
 
Jasmine: Thank you for your help at the Lighthouse...But this is
different. Please allow me to introduce myself. I am Jasmine, a
Gym Leader. I use the...clang! Steel type!...Do you know about
the Steel type? They are very hard, cold, sharp, and really strong!
Um... I'm not lying.
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9152] / +50%[$13728] / +75%[$16016] / +100%[$18304]
 
Jasmine: Um... I don't know how to say this, but good luck...

[$9256] / +50%[$13884] / +75%[$16198] / +100%[$18512]
 
Pryce: Pokémon have many experiences in their lives, just like
we do. I, too, have seen and suffered much in my life. Since I am 
your elder, let me show you what I mean. I have been training
Pokémon since before you were born. I do not lose easily. I,
Pryce--the Winter Trainer--shall demonstrate my power!
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9256] / +50%[$13884] / +75%[$16198] / +100%[$18512]
 
Pryce: It is you... Since you are here,
why don't we take a picture together?
Your Photo Album is full.\nAccess your PC to delete some pictures.
Pryce: That's OK, too. Suit yourself.

[$9360] / +50%[$14040] / +75%[$16380] / +100%[$18720]
 
Clair: Yo! Champ in the making! The Gym has unstable footing.
Keep your Pokémon in their Poké Balls. Now, Clair uses the
mythical and sacred Dragon-type Pokémon. You can't damage
them very easily. But you know, they're supposed to be weak
against Ice-type moves.
\n\n

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9360] / +50%[$14040] / +75%[$16380] / +100%[$18720]
 
Clair: What's the matter? Aren't you headed to the Pokémon
League? Your face...it tells me you have some unfinished
business... Wait a sec! You came from New Bark Town where
Professor Elm's Lab is, right? You may want to go back to
New Bark Town. Whatever you have to face from now, it'll be
more difficult. But don't you dare give up! If you do, I'll feel
even worse about having lost to you!...Give it your all.

Once you enter this door, you will be facing one of the Elite Four.
They are really tough! You cannot exit once you enter.
Are you ready? Be courageous and go for it!
Once you enter this door, you will be facing one of the Elite Four.\nThey are really tough! You cannot exit once you enter.\nAre you ready? Be courageous and go for it!

Welcome to the Pokémon League!
Allow me to introduce myself. I am Will. I have trained all around
the world, making my Psychic-type Pokémon powerful. And, at
last, I've been accepted into the Elite Four. I can only keep getting
better! Losing is not an option!
\n\n

Even though I was defeated, I won't change my course.
I will continue battling until I stand above all Trainers!
Now move on and experience the true ferocity of the Elite Four.

Even though I was defeated, I won't change my course.
I will continue battling until I stand above all Trainers!
Now move on and experience the true ferocity of the Elite Four.

Fwahahahaha! I am Koga of the Elite Four. I live in shadows--a
ninja! My intricate style will confound and destroy you!
Confusion, sleep, poison... Prepare to be the victim of my
sinister techniques! Fwahahahaha! Pokémon are not merely
about brute force--you shall see soon enough!
\n\n

I subjected you to everything I could muster. But my efforts
failed. I must hone my skills. Go on to the next room, and put
your abilities to the test!

I subjected you to everything I could muster. But my efforts
failed. I must hone my skills. Go on to the next room, and put
your abilities to the test!

I am Bruno of the Elite Four.
I always train to the extreme because I believe in our potential.
That is how we became strong. Can you withstand our power?
Hm? I see no fear in you. You look determined. Perfect for
battle! Ready, {00}? You will bow down
to our overwhelming power! Hoo hah!
\n\n

Having lost, I have no right to say anything...
Go face your next challenge!
Having lost, I have no right to say anything...\nGo face your next challenge!

I am Karen of the Elite Four. You're {00}?
How amusing. I love Dark-type Pokémon. I'm known for my
overpowering tactics. Think you can take them?
Just try to entertain me. Let's go.
\n\n

Strong Pokémon. Weak Pokémon. That is only the selfish
perception of people. Truly skilled Trainers should try to
win with the Pokémon they love best. I like your style. You
understand what's important. Go on--the Champion is waiting.

Strong Pokémon. Weak Pokémon. That is only the selfish
perception of people. Truly skilled Trainers should try to
win with the Pokémon they love best. I like your style. You
understand what's important. Go on--the Champion is waiting.

Lance: I've been waiting for you. {00}!
I knew that you, with your skills, would eventually reach me here.
There's no need for words now. We will battle to determine who is
the stronger of the two of us. As the most powerful Trainer and as
the Pokémon League Champion... I, Lance the dragon master,
accept your challenge!
\n\n

...Whew. You have become truly powerful, {00}.
Your Pokémon have responded to your strong and upstanding
nature. As a Trainer, you will continue to grow strong with
your Pokémon.
Mary: Oh, no! It's all over! Professor Oak, if you weren't so slow...\n\n

Professor Oak: Ah, {00}! It's been a long while.
You certainly look more impressive. Your conquest of the League
is just fantastic! Your dedication, trust, and love for your
Pokémon made this happen. Your Pokémon were outstanding,
too. Because they believed in you as a Trainer, they persevered.
Congratulations, {00}!
Mary: Let's interview the brand-new Champion!\n\n

Lance: This is getting to be a bit too noisy...
{00}, could you come with me?
Mary: Oh, wait! We haven't done the interview!

Lance: It's been a long time since I last came here. This is where
we commemorate the League Champions for all eternity. Their
courageous Pokémon are also inducted. Here today, we
witnessed the rise of a new League Champion-- a Trainer who
feels compassion for, and trust toward, all Pokémon. A Trainer
who succeeded through perseverance and determination.
The new League Champion who has all the makings of
greatness! {00}, allow me to register you
and your partners as Champions!
Kurt: You have Apricorns for me?\nFine! I'll turn them into Poké Balls.
Kurt: Ah, {00}!\nI just finished your Poké Ball. Here!
Kurt: That turned out great.\nTry catching Pokémon with it.
Go ahead and play my Coin game!\nMake my heart pound with excitement!
Mr. Game: Huh? Why don't you sit across from me\nand show me how you play?
Welcome!\nWe exchange your Coins for fabulous prizes!

There are some shops downstairs!
-Monday Mornings the Bargain shop is open.
-Tuesday, Thursday,and Saturday the Older Barber's present.
-Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday the Younger Barber's present
-Saturday and Sunday the Herb Shop is open

There are some shops downstairs...
-Monday Mornings the Bargain shop is open.
-Tuesday, Thursday,and Saturday the Older Barber's present.
-Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday the Younger Barber's present
-Saturday and Sunday the Herb Shop is open
Hello, dear. I sell inexpensive herbal medicine.\nThey're good, but a trifle bitter.\nYour Pokémon may not like them. Hehehehe...

Welcome! I run the Pokémon Salon! I'm the older and
better of the two Haircut Brothers. I can make your Pokémon
beautiful for just $500. Grooming gives a better look.
Your Pokémon will become friendlier and more beautiful.
Would you like me to do that?

Welcome to the Pokémon Salon!I'm the younger and less
expensive of the two Haircut Brothers. I'll spruce up your
Pokémon for just $300. Grooming gives a better look.
Your Pokémon will become friendlier and more beautiful.
So? How about it?
I'm the Day-Care Lady. We can raise Pokémon for you.\nWould you like us to raise your Pokémon?
Oh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.\nYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back another time.

Fine, we'll raise your {00} for a while.
Come back for it later.
We can raise two of your Pokémon.\nWould you like us to raise another?
Your Pokémon team is full.\nMake room, then come see me.

Ah, it's you! Good to see you.
Now, about your Pokémon...

By level, your {00} has
grown by about {01}.
Do you want your Pokémon back?
If you want your {00} back,\nit will cost ${01}.

{01} took {00} back
from the Day-Care Lady.
Do you want to take back the other one, too?
If you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna battle with?\nCome back another time.
Very good. Come again.
This tree looks like it can be\ncut down!
It's a rugged rock, but a Pokémon\nmay be able to smash it.
Surf can't be used if you have someone with you.
Rock Climb can't be used if you have someone with you.
The water is swirling and spinning around with a mighty roar.
There's a large, formidable tree that looks like it can\nbe headbutted!
